publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5797 Bill Wilson: Paisley to Host the Mod—That the Parliament congratulates Paisley on being named as the host for the Royal National Mod in 2013; notes that this is the first time that the Mod will have been held in Paisley, and congratulates those responsible for the successful bid, Renfrewshire Council and Meur Pháislig, the Paisley branch of An Comunn Gáidhealach, a charity responsible for the preservation and development of all aspects of Gaelic language and culture.

S3M-5797 Paisley to Host the Mod (lodged on 22 February 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Rob Gibson*, Michael Matheson*, Stuart McMillan*, Alasdair Allan*, Anne McLaughlin*, Dave Thompson*, Bill Kidd*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Aileen Campbell*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-5797 Paisley to Host the Mod (lodged on 22 February 2010) Brian Adam*, Hugh Henry*
